[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Flyout](./blockly.flyout_class.md)

## Flyout class

Class for a flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class Flyout extends DeleteArea implements IAutoHideable, IFlyout, IFocusableNode 
```
**Extends:** [DeleteArea](./blockly.deletearea_class.md)

**Implements:** [IAutoHideable](./blockly.iautohideable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md)

|  [dragAngleRange\_](./blockly.flyout_class.draganglerange__property.md) | <code>protected</code> | number | Range of a drag angle from a flyout considered "dragging toward workspace". Drags that are within the bounds of this many degrees from the orthogonal line to the flyout edge are considered to be "drags toward the workspace". |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoHide(onlyClosePopups)](./blockly.flyout_class.autohide_1_method.md) |  | Automatically hides the flyout if it is an autoclosing flyout. |

|  [createDom(tagName)](./blockly.flyout_class.createdom_1_method.md) |  | Creates the flyout's DOM. Only needs to be called once. The flyout can either exist as its own SVG element or be a g element nested inside a separate SVG element. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.flyout_class.dispose_1_method.md) |  | Dispose of this flyout. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks. |
|  [getContents()](./blockly.flyout_class.getcontents_1_method.md) |  | Get the list of elements of the current flyout. |
|  [getFlyoutScale()](./blockly.flyout_class.getflyoutscale_1_method.md) |  | Get the scale (zoom level) of the flyout. By default, this matches the target workspace scale, but this can be overridden. |

This is used in determineDragIntention\_ to determine if a new block should be created or if the flyout should scroll. |

|  [setVisible(visible)](./blockly.flyout_class.setvisible_1_method.md) |  | Set whether the flyout is visible. A value of true does not necessarily mean that the flyout is shown. It could be hidden because its container is hidden. |
